metadata.title: DevOps Engineer - Infrastructure Automation User Stories

user_stories.title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Provisioning
user_stories.story: As a cloud architect, I want automated multi-cloud infrastructure provisioning that can deploy resources across AWS, Azure, and GCP so that I can ensure high availability and avoid vendor lock-in.
acceptance_criteria: Deploy infrastructure across multiple cloud providers
Manage infrastructure as code with Terraform/CloudFormation

user_stories.title: Container Orchestration Management
user_stories.story: As a Kubernetes administrator, I want automated container orchestration that can manage deployments, scaling, and monitoring so that I can ensure reliable application delivery.

user_stories.title: Database Infrastructure Automation
user_stories.story: As a DBA, I want automated database infrastructure management that can handle provisioning, backups, and scaling so that I can ensure data availability and performance.

user_stories.title: Network Infrastructure Automation
user_stories.story: As a network engineer, I want automated network infrastructure management that can configure routing, security, and monitoring so that I can ensure network reliability and security.

user_stories.title: Infrastructure Cost Optimization
user_stories.story: As a DevOps engineer, I want automated cost optimization that can identify unused resources, optimize configurations, and track spending so that I can reduce infrastructure costs.
